instruction.value: May give up to 5 doses per 24 hours.

additionalnotes.value: Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 6 and up to 12 months of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 12 and up to 24 months of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 2 to under 4 years of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 4 to under 6 years of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 6 to under 9 years of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 9 to under 11 years of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.

Suggested dosing for children 11 to under 12 years of age. Acetaminophen dosing from all sources not to exceed: CHILDREN = 65 mg/kg/24 hours. Dosing should not exceed 5 doses per 24 hours. ADULTS: 4000 mg/24 hours.
